name: Mounted Blade
source: Qadira, Gateway to the East pg. 9
Qadira, Jewel of the East pg. 15
text: You can use the momentum of your mount to carry your weapon through one foe and into another.
prerequisites: Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack, Ride 3 ranks.
benefit: When you use the Ride-By Attack feat, if your attack hits, you can also make an attack against a target adjacent to your original target. You take a –5 penalty on this additional attack, which does not benefit from any effects of a charge.
text_zh: 你学会了该如何利用骑冲的势头来把你的武器从一个敌人斩向另一个敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 骑乘3级，骑乘战斗，骑乘掠击。
benefit_zh: 当你使用骑乘掠击专长时，如果你的攻击命中了，你可以对邻近最初目标的另一个目标再做出一次攻击。这次额外的攻击会在攻击骰上有-5的罚值，并且不享受任何冲锋带来的效果。
